itunes:title: Episode 624 - DB Sports Companion Show 06/23/20 - Has Brett Favre Lost His Mind?
title: Episode 624 - DB Sports Companion Show 06/23/20 - Has Brett Favre Lost His Mind?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Brett Favre’s controversial words regarding Colin Kaepernick’s decision to kneel during anthems, Dan points out that Lebron James has the power to completely halt the 2020 NBA season, the two debate whether or not ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Brett Favre’s controversial words regarding Colin Kaepernick’s decision to kneel during anthems, Dan points out that Lebron James has the power to completely halt the 2020 NBA season, the two debate whether or not the 2020 football season is going to happen amidst coronavirus cases rising amongst pro and college players, and the two go through bets regarding the 2020 election.

Ghostbed.com/DrinkinBros
